text:
@realDonaldTrump Until Dopey Don came along we didn't have 95,000 deaths.

Don's a "grabber" -- why didn't he move on the #coronavirus "like a bitch"?

Thousands of lives would have been saved.

#MAGA @GOP @joebiden
